name: Wait List - After School Program - Jackson
description: You are adding to the wait list only The After School program is currently full. You are adding to the wait list for the 2024-25 school year. If a spot opens up and we are able to offer you a spot, we will reach out. This afterschool program only pick up participants from Daniel Webster. Our after school program is an experience that provides a safe and nurturing environment for youth in grades K-5 to develop life long recreation and leisure skills. Participants will receive homework assistance,
